name: StrikeBox: Sandbox&Shooter
description: StrikeBox is a multiplayer first-person shooter with elements of a construction sandbox. The game can be built from base and shelter objects. You can play with friends up to 10 people in the game. The game has a lot of different weapons, from pistols to bazookas and grenade launchers. You can also spawn equipment: cars, helicopters and use in the game.
